name: Real-time workflow
description: Workflow consuming weather data from Pub/Sub and writing to BigQuery

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: The GCP project to use for Pub/Sub and BigQuery.

parameters.name: pubsub_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub subscription
parameters.helpText: The Pub/Sub topic to read weather data from in format projects/<project_id>/subscriptions/<subscription_id>.

parameters.name: bigtable_instance_id
parameters.label: BigQuery instance ID
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery instance ID to write weather data to.

parameters.name: bigtable_table_id
parameters.label: BigQuery table ID
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table ID to write weather data to.
